roleset.name: morally upstanding

example.name: arg1
example.text: In reality , the best ethics process is to have government employees and officials who [*] are ethical , and to have people in positions of power who wo n't put up with bending the rules .

example.name: concatenation
example.text: I feel compelled to make a Robin Hood reference, do you feel that he was ethical to rob from the rich and give to the poor?
example.arg: to rob from the rich and give to the poor?

roleset.note: ETHICAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from ethical.01-j)
